revision.text: ==Volapük== ===Etymology=== From {{compound|vo|yel|t1=year|-a|t2=genitive ending|cen|t3=change}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|vo|/jelaˈt͡ʃen/}} ===Noun=== {{vo-noun}} # [[turn of the year]] #* '''1957''' January, F. J. Krüger, "Lio spetid e plak Volapüka binons-li? (Vödem redaka)", ''Volapükagased pro Nedänapükans'', issue 1, 1. #*: Pötü '''yelacen''' lofobs reidanes lestüumik{{sic}} obsik vipis gudikün obas. #*:: On the occasion of the '''turn of the year''', we offer our esteemed readers our best wishes. ====Declension==== {{vo-decl-noun}}
